imdb.title: Yami to bôshi to hon no tabibito
imdb.plot: This Japanese anime series chronicles the incredible journey of Hazuki through many fantasy worlds in search of her one true love. Hazuki is a high school girl who lives with her adopted older sister, Hatsumi. Even though they've ...

episodes.title: Fujihime
episodes.plot: Hazuki saves a fox spirit, Meilin, from a band of samurai in a feudal Japanese world. She encounters Princess Fuji, who looks identical to Hatsumi except that she speaks. Ninjas intent on gaining Princess Fuji's mysterious power attack the mansion.

episodes.title: Tamamo no mae
episodes.plot: With Lilith's help, the ship warps within reach of a suitable planet. The children land on the planet with the DNA samples of Earth's animals.
